faqs.q: How many calories in a slice of pumpkin pie?
faqs.a: Approximately 323 calories for a standard 1/8 slice of 9-inch pie.

faqs.q: What's the carb count in pumpkin pie per slice?
faqs.a: About 46 g carbs, including 2.5 g fiber and 25 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is pumpkin pie high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, around 14 g total fat per slice, with 7 g saturated.

faqs.q: How does serving size affect calories in pumpkin pie?
faqs.a: A smaller 1/10 slice would be ~258 kcal; larger portions increase totals proportionally.

faqs.q: Can I make pumpkin pie lower calorie?
faqs.a: Yes, opt for crustless, low-sugar recipes, or Greek yogurt instead of cream to cut ~40-100 kcal per slice.
